metadata.title: CVE-2023-48234 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Vim is an open source command line text editor. When getting the count fora normal mode z command, it may overflow for large counts given. Impact islow, user interaction is required and a crash may not even happen in allsituations. This issue has been addressed in commit `58f9befca1` which hasbeen included in release version 9.0.2109. Users are advised to upgrade.There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
